alert.note: Alert for Clay; Nuckolls (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 30 at 7:57AM CDT until July 30 at 8:30AM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: The National Weather Service in Hastings has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Clay County in south central Nebraska... Northwestern Nuckolls County in south central Nebraska... * Until 830 AM CDT. * At 757 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Glenvil, or 13 miles southeast of Hastings, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Fairfield around 810 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Deweese and Edgar. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
